name: tunda
description:
- Tunda is a mobile application built to perform stock-taking operations in Kenyan based grocery shop or fruit shop. - The project is closer to heart than a business approach. - My mum has been very instrumental in my journey to becoming a software engineer.
I saw it only necessary to build a tool to help in her daily business activities where she sells fruits.
Tunda is a mobile application built with her business operations in mind. - Flutter has been used to develop the frontend features. - NodeJS has been used to create the CRUD operations. - SQLite has been utilized to store data that is necessary in the operations of the application.
